name: Crossy Cats
description:
Lead cats to the goal. A ghost leg (Amidakuji) style brain training puzzle Crossy Cats!

It is easy to play. Just move boards and tap the cat.
Can you clear all the stages which look easy, but actually difficult?
It is an intellectual game for everyone, from kids to grownups!

◆ Cats move according to the Amidakuji rules.
Move the boards on the stage and lead all the cats to the earthen pipes.
(It is also fun to see the cats in different forms by making intentional mistakes.)

◆ Pick up every fish you encounter.
The more fish you gather, the more stages become available for you. Gather more and more fish.

◆ Satisfying 100 stages in total
From easy stages to super difficult ones, you can play 100 in total.
Additional stages are planned in future updates!

◆ Share your Amidakuji
Share the Amidakuji positions which you cleared or missed.
Watching your friends' challenges might give you a hint!?
